Welcome!

We are a group at the Section of Industrial Microbiology, within the Department of Biotechnology at TU Delft.

We seek to build quantitative and predictive models that can help us understand and engineer the structure and function of microbial communities.

To learn more about our work, check out our research page and some finished pieces.
